SELECT t.code ,t.type ,t.name ,t.pic ,t.adv_pic ,t.price
,t.location ,t.order_no ,t.status ,t.updater ,t.update_datetime
,t.remark ,t.model_code ,tm.name model_name FROM tdzt_craft t INNER JOIN tdzt_model tm ON t.model_code = tm.code
ORDER BY order_no
SELECT count(1) FROM tdzt_craft t INNER JOIN tdzt_model tm ON t.model_code = tm.code
SELECT COUNT(tm.code) FROM (SELECT * FROM tdzt_craft t WHERE model_code=#{modelCode} AND STATUS='1' GROUP BY type) tm;
